channel.title: Horizon on vCO Team
channel.description: Recent content in Horizon on vCO Team

item.title: VMware Horizon vCenter Orchestrator Plug-in Released
item.description: Hello all you end user compute admins! If you've been waiting for a vCO plug-in for your Horizon environment, your wait is over. Join Aaron Black in this "Getting Started with vCenter Orchestrator Horizon Plug In" video. In order to get the plug-in, you must be licensed for Horizon 6.0 Enterprise. For a quick link to the download (login required at VMware's site), click Links -> Plug Ins, then scroll down to the "
